summary: Anselmo Pandolfini kidnaps a famous American diva to reunite her with her lover John, organizing a party based on spaghetti and Italian wines.
cast: Alberto Sordi|Dorian Gray|Belinda Lee|Gino Cervi|Rossana Martini|Vicente Parra|Patrizia Della Rovere|Giulio Paradisi|Paloma Valdés|Mercedes Alonso|Laura Carli|Marcello Giorda|Antonio Cifariello|Carlos Ramírez|Pilar Cano|Luz Márquez|Rafael Peralta|Amalia Rodríguez|Ricardo Tundidor|Cristina Luján|Julio Peña|Enrico Cesaretti|José Marco Davó|Manuel Gil|Giulio Marchetti|Luis Peña|Pedro Rodríguez de Quevedo
title: Vacaciones en Mallorca
